DPIScale.desc: Whether or not to correct for non standard dpi.

GuiSize.desc: The callback that will be called on `WM_SIZE`.

GuiMoved.desc: The callback that will be called on `WM_MOVE`.

GuiClose.desc: The callback that will be called on `WM_SYSCOMMAND` if `wParam` equals `SC_CLOSE`.

GuiActivate.desc: The callback that will be called on `WM_ACTIVATE`.

GuiContextMenu.desc: The callback that will be called on `WM_CONTEXTMENU`.

DropTarges.desc: An object of hwnds mapping to callbacks that will be call on `WM_DROPFILES` if the event was on a control with the corresponding hwnd. To register a callback see `GridGUI.GUI.RegisterDropTarget`.

ForegroundCtrls.desc: An array of controls that should be raised above all newly added controls and which are redrawn after other controls have been drawn. To register a foreground control see `GridGUI.GUI.RegisterForeground`.

BackgroundCtrls.desc: An array of controls that should be lowered below all newly added controls and which have the style `WS_CLIPSIBLINGS` applied. To register a background control see `GridGUI.GUI.RegisterBackground`.

__CheckOptions.desc: Parses option strings for values that are used by the class and updated the instance based on the values.

args.name: options
args.desc: An ahk GUI option string.

returns.desc: The `options` argument minus anything that class handles, currently only `gLabels` are removed.

__DPIScale.desc: Scale a position by the dpi ratio, that is `A_ScreenDPI / 96`.

args.name: pos
args.desc: The `GridGUI.Position` instance to scale.

args.name: enlarge
args.desc: Whether to increase or decrease the size of `pos`.

__GuiActivate.desc: The internal callback on `WM_ACTIVATE` that calls the user defined `GridGUI.GUI.GuiActivate` if it evaluates to true. The callback is called with the low-order word of `wParam`.

args.name: wParam
args.desc: Low-order word is the active state of the changed window, the high-order word is whether the window was minimised. If the low-order word is **1** the window was activated, if it is **2** the window was activated by a mouse click and if it is **0** the window is deactivated.

args.name: lParam
args.desc: The hwnd of the window where the active state of the window changed.

args.name: msg
args.desc: WM_ACTIVATE (0x0006).

args.name: hwnd
args.desc: The hwnd of the window or control that recieved the message.

__GuiContextMenu.desc: The internal callback on `WM_CONTEXTMENU` that calls the user defined `GridGUI.GUI.GuiContextMenu` if it evaluates to true. The callback is called with the clicked coordinate as a `GridGUI.Position` and with the hwnd of the windows that was right-clicked.

args.name: wParam
args.desc: The hwnd of the windows that was right-clicked.

args.name: lParam
args.desc: The clicked coordinate. The low-order word is the x coordinate. The high-order word is the y coordinate.

args.name: msg
args.desc: WM_CONTEXTMENU (0x007B).

args.name: hwnd
args.desc: The hwnd of the window or control that recieved the message.

__GuiDropFiles.desc: The internal callback on `WM_DROPFILES` that calls the user defined `GridGUI.GUI.DropTarges` if the callback associated array has the `hwnd` argument as one of its key. The callback is called with an array of the dropped files.

args.name: hDrop
args.desc: A handle to an internal structure describing the dropped files.

args.name: lParam
args.desc: Always zero.

args.name: msg
args.desc: WM_DROPFILES (0x0233).

args.name: hwnd
args.desc: The hwnd of the window or control that recieved the message.

__GuiInit.desc: Initialises all the members of the GUI class.

__GuiMoved.desc: The internal callback on `WM_MOVE` that calls `GridGUI.GUI._GuiMoved` with the new location as a `GridGUI.Position`.

args.name: wParam
args.desc: Unused.

args.name: lParam
args.desc: The coordinate of the top left corner of the window. The low-order word is the x coordinate and the high-order word is the y coordinate.

args.name: msg
args.desc: WM_MOVE (0x0003).

args.name: hwnd
args.desc: The hwnd of the window or control that recieved the message.

__GuiSize.desc: The internal callback on `WM_SIZE` that calls `GridGUI.GUI._GuiSize` with the new area as a `GridGUI.Position` where x and y are both zero and with the `wParam` argument.

args.name: wParam
args.desc: The type of resizing that have occurred. **0** is normal resizing, **1** means that the window was minimised and **2** means that it was maximised.

args.name: lParam
args.desc: The new area of the window. The low-order word is the width and the high-order word is the height.

args.name: msg
args.desc: WM_SIZE (0x0005).

args.name: hwnd
args.desc: The hwnd of the window or control that recieved the message.

__OnPaint.desc: The internal callback on `WM_PAINT` that calls `GridGUI.GUI.__ReDrawForgoundCtrls` to fix issues with overlapping controls for controls registered in `GridGUI.GUI.ForegroundCtrls`.

args.name: wParam
args.desc: Unused.

args.name: lParam
args.desc: Unused.

args.name: msg
args.desc: WM_PAINT (0x000F).

args.name: hwnd
args.desc: The hwnd of the window or control that recieved the message.

__SysCommand.desc: The internal callback on `WM_SYSCOMMAND` that calls the user defined `GridGUI.GUI.GuiClose` callback on `SC_CLOSE` if the callback variable evaluates to true.

args.name: wParam
args.desc: The type of system command requested, see link for a list of values.

args.name: lParam
args.desc: The coordinate of the mouse, if this message was triggered by a menu selection, otherwise the argument is unused. The low-order word is the x coordinate and the high-order word is the y coordinate.

args.name: msg
args.desc: WM_SYSCOMMAND (0x0112).

args.name: hwnd
args.desc: The hwnd of the window or control that recieved the message.
